hero_title: Build an Empire, Not a Product.
hero_subtitle: Ekobol is Me the Tech's "thinking code" philosophy. More than a tool that unifies marketplaces; it is an autonomous growth engine designed for you to dominate the digital world.
genesis_title: Genesis Engine: From Idea to Phenomenon
genesis_step1_desc: Connect all your marketplaces. Upload your products. Integrate the raw material into a single central brain.
genesis_step2_desc: Unleash the power of AI. Create perfect visuals, hypnotic descriptions, and unbeatable pricing strategies.
genesis_step3_desc: Watch your empire from a single unified panel. Dominate the market with real-time data and leave your competitors behind.
playground_title: AI Playground: The Power of Creation
playground_subtitle: Witness how an ordinary product transforms into a market phenomenon with Ekobol's artificial intelligence.
playground_desc_content: Rewrite the rules of the street. Designed for urban exploration, the 'Nebula' model combines breathable composite mesh and a reactive foam sole. With every step, don't just walk, flow into the future.
final_cta_subtitle: Stop unifying platforms. Start dominating the market. Discover our flexible plans and lay the foundation of your empire.

solutions.subtitle: Whether you are a creative artisan, a growing brand, or an established manufacturer... Choose one of the strategic paths designed to build your empire.

artisan.title: For the Artisan Ruler: Basic Plan
artisan.description: For those who like to be in control but hate repetitive tasks. The basic plan provides full access to our AI-powered platform for a fair 10% profit share. You manage the strategy, we automate the drudgery and give you back your most valuable asset: time.
artisan.alt: An artisan ruler working in their workshop

architect.title: For the Empire Architect: Partner Plan
architect.description: Your genius is in creating great products, not managing digital operations. With the 50/50 Partner Plan, you just produce and ship. We'll take care of the rest: build your brand, run your marketing, optimize your listings. We build your empire on your behalf.
architect.alt: Empire architects collaborating on a project

strategist.title: For the Master Strategist: Dynamic Plan
strategist.description: Your needs evolve. The Dynamic Plan offers an adjustable revenue share based on the workload between you and our platform. As you take on more responsibility, your profit share increases. This is the ultimate flexible partnership for growing businesses.

pricing.subtitle: The scale of your empire is determined by the strength of the alliance you choose. No hidden costs. Only shared victory.

rebel.title: Rebel Pact
rebel.subtitle: For the lone warriors who stay in control.

ruler.title: Ruler's Decree
ruler.subtitle: For those who only set the vision.

blacksmith.title: Blacksmith's Forge
blacksmith.subtitle: For the masters who forge their own arsenal.
features: Create your own plan with marketplace tiers and AI tools

alliances.title: Custom Alliances
alliances.subtitle: Beyond the standard pacts, for special missions.

dynamic.title: Dynamic Alliance
dynamic.description: A flexible partnership that shares the workload and constantly adjusts the profit share. It evolves with you.

build_transfer.title: Build and Transfer Decree
build_transfer.description: We build your empire for you and hand you the keys. A one-time, powerful start.

faq.title: War Council: FAQ
faq.subtitle: What you need to know before setting your strategy.

questions.q: What exactly does "% of Profit" mean?
questions.a: Profit is the net revenue after product costs and marketplace commissions are deducted. We show every penny transparently in your finance panel. Nothing is hidden.

questions.q: Can I change or cancel my plan at any time?
questions.a: Yes. The decree is yours. There are no long-term commitments. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan for your next billing cycle at any time.

questions.q: Who owns the website and brand in the Ruler's Decree?
questions.a: You. We build and manage on your behalf, but all intellectual property rights and assets are entirely yours. We are just the loyal architects of your empire.

resources.title: Grow More and Smarter.
resources.subtitle: Dive into our collection of resources designed to help you succeed in the ever-changing world of e-commerce.

blog.title: Ekobol Blog
blog.description: Stay up-to-date with the latest e-commerce trends, AI strategies, and tips for multi-marketplace success.

success_stories.title: Success Stories
success_stories.description: See how real businesses have scaled their operations and increased their revenue with Ekobol.

help_center.title: Help Center & Docs
help_center.description: Find step-by-step guides, technical documentation, and answers to frequently asked questions.

webinars.title: Webinars & Tutorials
webinars.description: Watch on-demand webinars and video tutorials to learn about Ekobol's features and advanced e-commerce strategies.

title.line1: We are the Builders, the Dreamers, and

about.subtitle: Ekobol was born from a simple idea: e-commerce should be about great products, not tedious processes. We are Me the Tech, and Ekobol is our answer to the complex digital world.

founders.title: Meet the Founders
founders.subtitle: The driving force behind Ekobol's innovation and architecture.

members.name: Mete Avcı
members.bio: Mete is obsessed with the user. He designed Ekobol's intuitive interface and leads the development of our groundbreaking AI features, ensuring that powerful technology feels effortless and magical.

members.name: Doğa Aydın
members.bio: Doğa is the backbone of Ekobol. He engineered the robust, scalable, and secure full-stack architecture that ensures real-time synchronization and flawless performance across countless marketplaces.

content.part1: Ekobol is the first product of
content.part3: . Our philosophy is that technology should be an extension of human creativity, not a barrier to it. We build "thinking codes and working systems" that act like living organisms. From AI-powered graphic design to intelligent web infrastructures, we infuse every code we write with purpose and intelligence. Ekobol is the embodiment of this vision, created for you to build your digital empire.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions about the Dynamic Plan, partnerships, or anything else? Our team is ready to help you.
